David Cronenberg's cinematic intensity eviscerates this adaptation of David Henry Hwang's passionate stage production. Butterfly begins in 1964 Beijing when French foreign service employee Rene Gallimard (Jeremy Irons) becomes smitten with Chinese opera performer Song Liling (John Lone).
